fields.description:
Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. If only a month or day are not available, these may be omitted.

This field records the start date of some event, activity or moment in the lifetime of a grant. At a minimum events/activities must have a start date.
fields.title: Start Date
fields.name: startDate

fields.description:
Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. If only a month or day are not available, these may be omitted.

Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in days) or an end date.
fields.title: End Date
fields.name: endDate

fields.description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in days) or an end date.
fields.title: Duration (months)
fields.name: duration
